ygData.subject: Re: Money issues
ygData.msgSnippet: Well on established servers there is already a group and you can head there once you hit level 21 because you will be grouping with people level up to level
ygData.messageBody:
Well on established servers there is already a group and you can head there
once you hit level 21 because you will be grouping with people level up to
level 30. It doesn't matter though you still gain exp like mad and get great
money.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Fraal <mata_eq@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, September 23, 1999 9:31 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Money issues


>From: "Fraal" <mata_eq@...>
>
>What lvl are Treants? Can 3 people around LVL 21 take one?
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Jerry Luttrell <tinarin@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 2:10 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Money issues
>
>
>> From: "Jerry Luttrell" <tinarin@...>
>>
>> Don't bother with loot yet... After 25 or 30 it will start to come in...
>> Especially if you hunt the treants...
>>
>>

>> >Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Money issues

>> >From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
>> >
>> >sure, those things are nice, but why choose money over xp? once you are
>> >over L20 you can start gathering unto you those things that are yours =)
>> >its better to spend 2 weeks getting to L20 than spend 2 weeks getting
>100pp
>> >so you can get an item, and only being L18. trust me, patience is the
>way
>> >to go- i still have yet to buy any items, and i am L24. not only that,
>but
>> >i have some rather good stuff. (does trading count? ive made some good
>> >trades). i take that back. at L10 i bought a dagger of marnek, and
later
>> >on
>> >i bought some int rings. i also bought a dragoon dirk. but total that
>was
>> >around 50pp, if that.
>> >
>> >belphenor
>> >
>> >
>> >
>> >>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>> >>
>> >>hm...silly question, but where is the single spawn
>> >>aviak? I am not that familiar with the zone, since it
>> >>seems to be extremly crowded all the time.
>> >>
>> >>I want money to buy some of the perks...like a
>> >>savant's cap, or intelligence earrings. :)
>> >>
>> >>--- Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
>> >> > From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>> >> >
>> >> > Overall I don't see any use for money except buying
>> >> > important spells at
>> >> > those levels. As of right now I would suggest that
>> >> > you take on some Aviak
>> >> > Guards in Lake Rathe and fight them for a bit. They
>> >> > have decent loot and
>> >> > great exp. All you really need to do is level money
>> >> > will begin to roll in
>> >> > the 20's and you'll be fine again money wise.
>> >> >
>> >> > Naeeldar
